sourcesContent:
import { useContext } from 'react'; import { CartContext } from '../../contexts/CartContext'; import './cart.css'; const ShoppingCart = () => { const cart = useContext(CartContext); console.log("Cart Page -", cart.items); return (

Your Cart

{cart.items.map((item) => ( ))}
Title Price Quantity Total
{item.title} {item.movieYear} {item.movieDirector} {item.movieGenres.map((gObj, gIndex) => ( {gObj.genreName} {gIndex < item.movieGenres.length - 1 && ', '} ))} {item.movieStars.map((sObj, sIndex) => ( {sObj.starName} {sIndex < item.movieStars.length - 1 && ', '} ))} {item.movieRating}

Sub-Total:

Sales Tax:

Grand Total:

) } export default ShoppingCart;
